title: Is it racist if an Arab gets box braids or cornrows? - Quora

response.answer_text: “ Is it racist if an Arab gets box braids or corn rows ?” In real life or on Quora ? In real life racism has to do with looking down on or even mistreating people on account of “ race.” On Quora there is no telling what racism means , but it is seemingly a widespread and difficult phenomenon to spot given how many Quora questions begin with Is it racist to ….then giving many presumably relevant details. In real life asking if something is racist is like asking if Bob Gibson is throwing at you. If he is throwing at you , you will know and you will probably be on your ads. It is not a phenomenon about which there need be much doubt. A spheroid traveling at 95 mph right under your chin -yes he is throwing at you.

Why? Everyone in the entire world has a right to wear box braids and cornrows because all cultures at one time or another have had braids and cornrows. Old photograph showing Arabs with braids:  Modern Egyptian with braids. After all, her ancestors had braids and cornrows:  Ancient Greek with cornrows  Ancient sculpture of female Viking warrior with braids:  Cleopatra with cornrows and braid
